title: SAP CC Notification Agent - MediationZone Documentation 9.4 - InfoZone
text: The SAP CC Notification agent is a collection agent designed to listen for and collect notifications from the SAP Convergent Charging Core Server. The SAP CC Notification agent generates notification UDRs. For more information about the notification UDRs, refer to Notification UDRs . The agent relies on the SAP CC Notification Client (NotificationServiceClient) to handle all communication with the SAP CC instances. For more information regarding this SAP AP I, refer to the NotificationServiceClient SAP documentation . Note! The SAP CC Notification API does not support any acknowledgment that a notification has been received by a client. There is no mechanism in the Convergent Charging Core Server for a retry, and therefore there is no guarantee that a notification has successfully been transmitted. Loading
